thread.title: Microsoft reaffirms plans to retire the Control Panel in future Windows 10 builds

title: Microsoft reaffirms plans to retire the Control Panel in future Windows 10 builds
text:
Microsoft reaffirms plans to retire the Control Panel in future Windows 10 builds 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft drew ire for having two different applications to control system settings, but it now looks like the software maker will continue ...
